br.com.limaogames.librpg.framework.abstracts

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.limaogames.librpg.framework.abstracts.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemListener, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Accessory, Armor, Helm, Potion, Shield, Weapon

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements ItemListener, java.io.Serializable
    Model class to be inherited by game items classes. Items are a crucial part on rpg games such quests, adventurers, etc. Items can be purchased inner-game, purchased outer-game, win as a prize, etc. This class is not much used. Inheritance is more commonly used on its children.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Limao Games
    Email: andreikeda@limaogames.com.br
    created on: 06/02/2014
    See Also:
    ItemListener, Serializable, Serialized Form

          double cost,

        Description copied from interface: ItemListener
        Creates instance of Item.
        Specified by:
        create in interface ItemListener
        Parameters:
        id - - object's identifier.
        name - - object's name. It can be null, but it's not recommended.
        description - - object's description. It can be null.
        attRequirements - - object's attribute values requirements.
        cost - - object's price.
        quantity - - object's quantity.

      • getAttributeRequirements

        public int[] getAttributeRequirements()
        Returns an attribute requirement array of int. If Adventurer doesn't match the requirements, he can't use the item.
        Returns:
        Array of int - attribute requirement used to check if Adventurer can use the item.
